item.title: Practical Guide To Begin with Markdown
item.description: Practical Guide To Begin with Markdown Good morning/afternoon/evening, whatever time you are reading this post. Friend, thank you for passing by. As a short disclaimer, I want to let you know that I’m not a developer, simply someone who is curious about technology and willing to learn things by teaching them. It sounds crazy right? Originally defined by Jean-Pol Martin in the 1980s, this method is focused on gathering knowledge and explain it to someone with your own words.
